faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Answers to the most common questions about Traceo.
faq.a1: Traceo is a free platform to help locate missing persons in Brazil. We use artificial intelligence to compare photos and find potential matches.
faq.q2: How does registering a missing person work?
faq.a2: Any family member can create an account and register a missing person with a photo, physical description, and disappearance location. The platform automatically generates age progression images and compares them with registered homeless persons.
faq.a3: Yes, Traceo is 100% free. Our goal is to reunite families, not to make profit.
faq.a4: Yes. We use encryption, secure authentication, and follow LGPD guidelines. Photos and personal data are processed exclusively for search purposes and are never shared with third parties.
faq.a5: You can report sightings of people who appear to be homeless, share missing persons' profiles on social media, and spread the word about the platform.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.section1Text: By accessing and using Traceo, you agree to these Terms of Use. If you do not agree, please do not use the platform.
terms.section2Text: Traceo is intended exclusively for assisting in locating missing persons. It is prohibited to submit false information, use the platform for illegal purposes, or violate the privacy of others.
terms.section3Text: Users are responsible for the accuracy of submitted information. Traceo is not liable for incorrect information provided by users but reserves the right to remove inappropriate content.
terms.section4Text: All platform content, including code, design, and branding, is the property of Traceo. Photos uploaded by users remain the property of their respective authors.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Text: We collect: name, email, phone (registration); name, photo, physical description, location (missing persons and homeless); location and observation (sightings).
privacy.section2Text: Data is used exclusively to assist in locating missing persons, including facial comparison by artificial intelligence and notification of potential matches.
privacy.section3Text: We do not share personal data with third parties. Photos are processed by Google Gemini (within Google Cloud Platform) exclusively for facial analysis.
privacy.section4Text: You have the right to: access your data, correct information, delete your account and all associated data, and revoke consent at any time.
privacy.section5Text: We use encryption in transit (HTTPS), Firebase authentication, and secure storage on Google Cloud Platform.
